events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 28th involving another vehicle on the highway.
The claim has been categorised as an auto accident case based on the keywords found in the initial report.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and gather further information.
We have acknowledged receipt of your auto accident claim and will begin processing the details promptly.
The customer was asked to provide a copy of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and witness statements.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and images showing the extent of car damage.
Our claims team has started the investigation to verify the details of the auto accident and validate submitted evidence.
The investigation into the vehicle collision has been completed with confirmation that fault lies with the other driver.
A settlement offer for vehicle repairs and related expenses has been proposed to the customer in line with policy terms.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling and settlement offer for the auto accident claim.
The auto accident claim has been formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Insurance payment was issued to cover the repair costs of the vehicle as detailed in the approved settlement.
The auto accident claim case has been successfully closed after full payment and customer confirmation.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived for future reference and regulatory compliance.
